alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 9:08PM EST until November 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MONDAY TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, especially in the eastern half of the county. Locally higher amounts to 10 inches are possible in the northeast portion of the county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cuyahoga county. * WHEN...From 7 PM Monday to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to push south into area Monday night into Tuesday morning with rates in excess of 1 inch per hour in the heaviest snow bands. The greatest accumulations are expected across eastern portions of the county with impacts to the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
